summary: zlib bug fix and enhancement update
details:
The zlib packages provide a general-purpose lossless data compression
library that is used by many different programs.

Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

* AlmaLinux8.1 - zlib: DFLTCC compression level switching issues (BZ#1926104)

* AlmaLinux8.2 - zlib: inflateSyncPoint() returns an incorrect result on z15
(BZ#1932270)
